headline: Las Vegas Sands (NYSE:LVS) Announces US$2 Billion Buyback Authorization Increase
summary: Las Vegas Sands (NYSE:LVS) experienced a notable 21% increase in its share price over the last quarter. The company's decision to repurchase over 10 million shares for nearly $450 million and the announcement of a buyback authorization increase to $2 billion likely supported this upward movement. Additionally, the declaration of a quarterly cash dividend may have provided further encouragement to investors looking for income. Although the company's earnings report showed a decline in sales...

headline: Las Vegas Sands, Wynn up 6% in early trade following Macau gaming revenue data
summary: Shares of Las Vegas Sands (LVS) and Wynn Resorts (WYNN) are the best-performing names on the S&P 500 in early trading, rising about 6% each following data by Macau’s Gaming Inspection and Coordination Bureau showing that Macau gaming revenue growth rate soared to 19% in June. Melco Resorts (MLCO) is also up 12% at $8.09 in early trade. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news. headline: Earnings Preview: What to Expect From Las Vegas Sands' Report
summary: Las Vegas Sands is all set to release its fiscal second-quarter earnings later this month, and analysts project earnings to be in-line with the year-ago quarter.
